statements: SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 101 AND completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 5
SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_enrollment GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_students > 5 ORDER BY total_students DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_desc FROM courses WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_desc LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 1;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date, completion_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM Enrollments JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Intro%' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT course_name, COUNT(registration_id) AS total_registrations FROM Courses JOIN Registrations ON Courses.course_id = Registrations.course_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_registrations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id;

SELECT student_name, final_grade FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Completions ON Registrations.registration_id = Completions.registration_id WHERE final_grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, completion_status FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, course_name, completion_date FROM Students s INNER JOIN CourseCompletions cc ON s.student_id = cc.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students s INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id INNER JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id WHERE grade >= 80;
